title: ILayerMgr.AddLayer
description: Adds a layer to this drawing document.
signature:
System.Int32 AddLayer( 
   System.String
NameIn
,
   System.String
DescIn
,
   System.Int32
ColorIn
,
   System.Int32
StyleIn
,
   System.Int32
WidthIn
)

parameters.name: ColorIn
parameters.description: COLORREF value specifying the desired color of items within this layer

parameters.name: StyleIn
parameters.description: Line style as defined in swLineStyles_e

parameters.name: WidthIn
parameters.description: Line width as defined in swLineWeights_e

returns: 1 if the layer was created successfully
